name: Ragdoll Labs
description:
Controls are Space, T, A, S, D because I couldn't get the UI stuff to work

some mild blood in V1.1 +

V1.2 Contains much easier blood and more detail in the map

V1.3 Has much better collisions and doors are easier to open

This ragdoll game isn't the best or even that good in my opinion since it's my first game on unity but it's good for a start

I SPENT AN ENTIRE DAY TRYING TO FIX DOWNLOAD PROBLEMS

and for anybody wondering any version works now i fixed them all
